net.unicon.cas.addons.authentication.strong.oath.totp
Interface TotpOathDetailsSource

All Superinterfaces:
AdditionalAuthenticationFactorPolicy
public interface TotpOathDetailsSource
extends AdditionalAuthenticationFactorPolicy

A strategy API to define operations pertaining to TOTP authentication information retrieval such as TOTP attributes for principals.

Concurrency semantics: implementations must be thread safe

Since:
0.5
Author:
Dmitriy kopylenko, Unicon, inc.

Method Detail

getOtpAttributesForPrincipal

Map<TotpOathDetailsSource.OTP,Object> getOtpAttributesForPrincipal(String principalId)
                                                                   throws AdditionalAuthenticationFactorPolicy.PrincipalNotFoundException
Retrieve OTP configuration attributes for a principal

Parameters:
principalId -
Returns:
a map of OTP attributes or null attributes are not configured for given principal.
Throws:
PrincipalNotFoundException - if no such principal exists in the OTP configuration store.
AdditionalAuthenticationFactorPolicy.PrincipalNotFoundException
